executableContent.instructions: Agrupa cada entrada del diccionario, incluyendo el `h3` y el texto, en elementos `details` separados cada uno, de modo que estén ocultos por defecto.

files.name: index.html
files.content:
Tech Dictionary

B

Back End

All of the behind-the-scenes digital operations that it takes to keep the front end of a website running.

Bug

An error or flaw in the website or app that keeps it from running as expected.

Bug

files.content:
Rental Listings

The Monrio

Minutes away from The Monroe are the iconic shops and restaurants that line the rapidly gentrifying South Congress (SoCo) Avenue, South First (SoFi) Street, and South Lamar (SoLa) Boulevard.

Lakeshore Pearl

Lakeshore Pearl, the premier apartments in Texas, is an elegant apartment community located just across the lake from downtown.
